boardgame.name: Ocaleni
Outlive
Pustina
Еще один день
boardgame.description: Outlive is a management/survival game in a post-apocalyptic universe in which nature has overcome its rights amongst the world of Men. In Outlive, players have six days (turns) to send heroes gathering resources during the day, while avoiding threats from other players and reinforce their settlements during the night, trying to recruit new survivors and adapt to the new world. The specifics: movements and resource gathering are compelled by your hero's strength._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You play six rounds (six days) that are divided between the day phase and the night phase. During the day phase, you move your four heroes of different strength on the board to collect resources with a mechanical movement innovative and interactive._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During the night phase, you manage your shelter, feed your survivors and recruit new ones, organize your survival, and improve your rooms and objects._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Only one clan can outlive this devastated world!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2018 RPC Fantasy Award Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 101: Origins 2017 and Sara and Lincoln Hot Seat
Episode 148 Joe Sallen_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Top Games and Disappointments of 2017
Episode 34 - So... You Should Play Alchemists
The Good The Board and The Highbrow: Episode 122 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Elitism_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Outlive is a game of worker displacement set in a post-apocalyptic world. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be leading one of four tribes in their struggle to survive in their underground shelters, tucked away from the now largely radioactive surface. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/laboitedejeu/outlive Brand New - Still in Shrink Kickstarter exclusive deluxe edition.
Opened/sorted, unplayed. Shipping will be USPS and will be well packaged.
This is the Kickstarter Exclusive Heroes pledge (new in plastic) and it comes with the extra XL board. Shipping costs are for the buyer. I accept paypal and bank transfer.
The normal KS-Edition with all stretch goals, only once played

Kickstarter Survivor Pledge Edition with stretch goals!! Game in hand!! It is still brand new and sealed as are the kickstarter exclusives. Pictures available upon request. Shipping will be $10 to lower 48 and actual cost elsewhere. Will ship within 3 business days of purchase. Thank you for shopping!

English edition Heroes Pledge. Played once. I used a a black and silver sharpie to write numbers on the edges of the hero miniatures to make the numbers easier to see. While playing it everyone commented on how helpful it was. Everything has been punched and organized. [ImageId=3581438]
Outlive Kickstarter Edition (incl. all Kickstarter Stretchgoals)

Just played once. Some parts are even not yet punched. Non-smoking household. Kickstarter Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition including all stretch goals. With English rules, but rules in other languages (e.g. German) are available online. Please ask for shipping costs before ordering. Game can also be picked-up in Oldenburg (Northern Germany). Payment via money transfer. I would accept Paypal if buyer pays for Paypal fee.
KS Edition, New in Shrink. This is a Heroes Pledge, with all stretch goals included. Buyer pays shipping, local pick-up from 92373.
played once will ship worldwide using DHL https://www.dhl.de/de/privatkunden/preise.html

Brand new in the shrink boxed and ready to go. Buyer responsible for shipping and any applicable fees (paypal). Heroes Pledge, collectors edition with all the stretch goals. * Includes XL playing board

Heroes Pledge/Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition. Includes all miniatures and stretch goals from the KS campaign. Also, I can do local pickup in San Jose, CA or Sacramento, CA.
Opened and played once. Big box - will not fit in a flat rate box.

Outlive is a management/survival game in a post-apocalyptic universe in which nature has overcome its rights amongst the world of Men. In Outlive, players have six days (turns) to send heroes gathering resources during the day, while avoiding threats from other players and reinforce their settlements during the night, trying to recruit new survivors and adapt to the new world. The specificities: movements and resource gathering are compelled by you heroes strength. Get one copy of Outlive Exclusive collector box including all unlocked stretch goals. Kickstarter Exclusive Heroes Pledge: Survivor Pledge Components + 326 plastic miniatures _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; resources + 11 illustrated removable storage boxes + Includes over sized player board Accept Paypal, Bitcoin or IBAN with BIC. I am a private seller, so if you have any questions just ask. You will only pay the shipping costs you want and need. I will get you a quote form your preferred shipping company beforehand. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/laboitedejeu/outlive

This is the Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Survivor pledge that includes the minis and molded plastic components as well as Kickstarter Exclusive content - https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgameexpansion/228048/outlive-kickstarter-exclusives The game has been played once and is mostly unpunched. All loose components are bagged and in pristine condition.

This is for the Kickstarter exclusive Heroes Pledge of Outlive from La Boite de Jeu. I have marked it as Like New condition having only been punched and played once, but there are three super minor flaws (all from packing and shipping I expect) - two on the box and one on the rulebook, please see the final three pictures for more details. Shipping is to be paid by the buyer from 10024. This is a big and heavy box so I recommend using UPS Ground, but will use whatever shipping method you prefer. You can contact me beforehand for a shipping quote. Local NYC pickup is allowed and encouraged! *No sales rating yet, please see my trade rating.

Kickstarter Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition. Played twice, cards are sleeved and everything in very good condition. Please keep in mind that in order to be able to open the tight boxes I cut small holes into the sides of the lids for getting some grasp with your fingers. They are however not necessarily symmetrical or perfectly aligned (see pictures). I also painted the numbers on the orange minis and applyed an ink wash as well (as seen in the pictures). This was not done for the miniatures of the other players. Shipping costs: Austria: 6€ (or meet up in Vienna) Germany: 15€ Rest of EU: 18€ Payment preferably via Bank transfer (IBAN).
